Repository Name Unauthorized: The University of Alabama (UAB) School of Nursing Archives
Notes: The archives/museum holds paper files, photographs, nursing caps, uniforms, various texts, nursing memorabilia; the school timeline banner; the interactive Barrett Brock MacKay Florence Nightingale Exhibit; Dean's portraits, photographs of honored faculty and alumni; Baccalaureate senior class composites/pictures, etc.
Source of Repository Data: Alabama Department of Archives and History
